resources.string: first touch activates the sudoku field, second touch opens the input dialog
Attention: Changing the difficulty level starts a new game!
each number on the sudoku grid automatically sets hints vertical, horizontal and group wise
on pressing HINT, a sudoku field gets activated (as easy touch), marking a field, where a number or a hint can be set
if 8 hints are displayed, the sudoku field gets activated
if a number is missing only once in 9 hints vertical, horizontal or group wise, the sudoku field gets activated
if a number is group wise bounded to a specific row/column, in the same row/column other groups can get hints, a sudoku field in this row/column gets activated
if in a group/row/column are n fields with the same n hints or less missing, hints can be set on the same numbers on the other fields, a sudoku field in this group/row/column gets activated
if in a group/row/column are n missing hints distributed over n fields only, then hints can be set on the other numbers on the same n fields, a sudoku field in this group/row/column gets activated
mark fields with a input not equal to the solution\n(duplicate inputs vertical, horizontal or group wise get marked by default)
let the device play for you
if a number is group wise bounded to a specific row/column, in the same row/column other groups get hints
if in a group/row/column are n fields with the same n hints or less missing, hints get set on the same numbers on the other fields
if in a group/row/column are n missing hints distributed over n fields only, then hints get set on the other numbers on the same n fields
if 8 hints are displayed, the missing number is inserted into the sudoku field
if a number is missing only once in 9 hints vertical, horizontal or group wise, it gets inserted into the sudoku field
